      • getTableNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTableNames(TargetDatabase targetDatabase)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a list of tablenames from the given Target Database object. Calls getTargetConnection using info in the Target Database object to connect to the target database, the type determines which JDBC driver it will use to connect to the given target database.

      • insertCode

        public boolean insertCode(TargetDatabase targetDatabase,
                          GeneratedCode generatedCode)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a boolean based on the success of inserting the given Generated Code object into the target database. Calls getTargetConnection using info in the Target Database object to connect to the target database, the type determines which JDBC driver it will use to connect to the given target database. Uses the code given by the GeneratedCode object to create a query, then runs an executeUpdate query. Based on the amount of affected columns it will send back true or false.
        Specified by:
        insertCode in interface ConnectionInterface
        Parameters:
        targetDatabase -
        generatedCode -
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getTargetConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getTargetConnection(java.lang.String type,
                                               java.lang.String connectionString,
                                               java.lang.String password,
                                               java.lang.String username)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a JDBC Connection based on the given information. Based on the type it will choose a different Connection class to return a connection. Uses the Template design pattern to easily return the right connection.
        Parameters:
        type -
        connectionString -
        password -
        username -
        Returns:
        Connection
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
